description.value:
You can produce a soft silk to weave into useful items. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Specialty Crafting] feat with a specialty in weaving.

You can use your webbing to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Craft] simple, nonconsumable threaded items, such as clothing and rope, at zero cost as long as their base Price is 1 sp or less. These items have no resale value, and they naturally degrade after 24 hours without regular (if minor) maintenance. You can maintain up to 10 such items at a time; if you create a new one, your oldest creation breaks down from neglect.

These temporary items take you only 1 day to Craft instead of 4. If you're an expert in Crafting, you can Craft these items in 1 hour; if you're a master, you can Craft them in 10 minutes; if you're legendary, you can Craft them in 1 minute.
